ActHistoric Sites and Monuments Act
PrecisAppointment of WILLIAM ANDREW WAISER, C.M., S.O.M., of Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, to be a member of the Historic Sites and Monuments Board of Canada, as a representative of the Province of Saskatchewan, to hold office during pleasure for a period of five years, effective January 30, 2019.
